dustOrderAmount.description: 订单被判定为灰尘单的数量，即小于该数量则不会继续撮合

enabled.description: 服务端当前是否支持该通证的充值提现等操作

exchangeId.description: 交易所在路印协议合约的编号

fee.description: 费用数量，单位为Wei数量的以太坊

market.description: The market identifier which is case insensitive and should be formatted as ABC-XYZ where ABC is the base token symbol and XYZ is the quote token symbol.

level.description: The aggregation level for the depth data. If maxLevel = 5, level = 3, then depth will aggregate in two decimal places.

limit.description: The maximum number of depth items to return for each side of the market. Defaults to 50.

markets.description: The market identifier which is case insensitive and should be formatted as ABC-XYZ where ABC is the base token symbol and XYZ is the quote token symbol.

limit.description: The maximum number of depth items to return for each side of the market. Defaults to 50.

legal.description: legal coin ratio, which includes: USD, CNY, JPY, EUR, GBP, KRW, HKD, MOP, CAD, AUD, SGD, PHP, THB, RUB

market.description: The market identifier which is case insensitive and should be formatted as ABC-XYZ where ABC is the base token symbol and XYZ is the quote token symbol.

fromId.description: specify later than which, id of market trades will returns. Defaults to 0

limit.description: The maximum number of depth items to return for each side of the market. Defaults to 20

offset.description: Offset of fill markets. Defaults to 0

market.description: The market identifier which is case insensitive and should be formatted as ABC-XYZ where ABC is the base token symbol and XYZ is the quote token symbol.

interval.description: The candlestick data interval, which includes: 1min, 5min, 15min, 30min, 1hr, 2hr, 4hr, 12hr, 1d, 1w

start.description: The start time of candlestick data. Defaults to current timestamp.

end.description: The end time of candlestick data.

limit.description: The number of candlestick data points. Defaults to 120.

address.description: The owning Ethereum address of the account
The owning Ethereum address of the account

owner.description: The owning Ethereum address of the account

token.description: The token's ERC20 smart contract address. Use 0x0 as the pseudo-address of Ether (ETH).

owner.description: The owning Ethereum address of the account

token.description: The token's ERC20 smart contract address. Use 0x0 as the pseudo-address of Ether (ETH).

publicKeyX.description: public key X in account's key pair

publicKeyY.description: public key Y in account's key pair

allOrNone.description: 订单是否只能完全成交或者0成交, 目前只支持false

buy.description: 买到为止或者卖出为止

validSince.description: 订单生效时间, 精确到秒

validUntil.description: 订单失效时间, 精确到秒

maxFeeBips.description: 用户可以接受的最大订单费用, 取值范围(万分之)1~63

clientOrderId.description: 客户端标识的订单唯一ID

GetOrderDetailRequest.description: 获取订单详情请求参数

fromHash.description: 锚定hash（会返回该hash以后的数据）

GetOrdersRequest.description: 获取订单列表的请求参数

data.description: SIGNED Ethereum transaction data, HEX string

amount.description: withdraw amount of token, decimal string in WEI

amountF.description: fee amount of token, decimal string in WEI

signatureRx.description: trading signature Rx of this order, decimal string

signatureRy.description: trading signature Ry of this order, decimal string

signatureS.description: trading signature S of this order, decimal string

statuses.description: Get user transactions by status, which includes: processing, processed, failed, received

types.description: get user transactions by type, which includes: deposit, onchainWithdrawal

fromHash.description: from which hash to get user transactions, hex string

limit.description: obtain count of user actions. Defaults to 50

offset.description: offset of user transactions. Defaults to 0

allType.description: token symbol of user transactions. Defaults to ''

orderHash.description: hash of order to fetch, decimal string

market.description: The market identifier which is case insensitive and should be formatted as ABC-XYZ where ABC is the base token symbol and XYZ is the quote token symbol.

fromId.description: specify later than which, ID of user trades will returns. Defaults to 0

limit.description: obtain count of user trades, used for paging. Defaults to 20

offset.description: offset of user fills, used for paging. Defaults to 0

markets.description: 以","分隔的要查询的市场列表
